title: Advanced Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Development Program Using Handheld Devices

context.prior_knowledge: Graduate-level mathematical theory and application skills
context.additional_context: Learning environment composed of professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, utilizing handheld devices (smartphones/tablets) as primary learning tools

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems with over 80% accuracy using handheld devices.
Learners can improve self-efficacy by over 20% in a device-based learning environment.
Learners develop creative problem-solving strategies using digital tools through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
